description:
Securing Resolutions To Life's Legal Challenges

We offer focused family law, personal injury and criminal law services at the law firm of Greenberg & Walden, LLC, in West New York, New Jersey. Guiding people through the legal problems that life may place in their path, we offer straightforward and thorough assessments aimed at helping clients achieve favorable resolutions to their legal issues. Representing people throughout Hudson County, our law firm team has more than 150 years of combined legal experience.

Serving Northern New Jersey Since 1956

Serving as our clients' advocates for more than six decades, we assist people with a range of issues. Our experience includes representing people with matters such as the following: divorce, child custody and support, domestic violence and neglect, fathers' rights, military divorce, same-sex family law, car accidents, trucking accidents, animal bites, brain injuries, birth injuries, slips and falls, nursing home abuse, construction accidents, workers' compensation, wrongful death, traffic violations and tickets, DUI and DWI, drug violations, and assault and battery.

Focusing On Our Clients

We provide free initial consultations at the law firm of Greenberg & Walden, LLC. At that time, we do not simply offer legal advice. Rather, we listen to people and talk to them about their situations, concerns and objectives. Our attorneys tailor their guidance and strategies to suit the needs and interests of each client we represent. Throughout the legal process, our clients can count on us to provide them with regular updates and to be there to answer their questions as they come up.
